p: Recently, various studies were conducted for screening the cytotoxic activity of these plant extracts against a variety of cancer types and resistance. These studies have shown a promising effect of using these extracts against some cancer cell lines [ 25, 26, 27, 28, 29]. Despite the useful biological activity expressed by certain plants, the study of their possible toxicity remains particularly important. As some chemicals or secondary metabolites from plants are toxins like substances that may cause harmful effects to humans.
